summary: The module supplies utilities for creating SVG graphics that illustrate the shape, chunking and size distribution of Dask arrays. It builds grid coordinates, draws size annotations, and assembles SVG elements for one‑dimensional, two‑dimensional, three‑dimensional and generic N‑dimensional arrays.
business_intent: Enable developers and users to visualise Dask array layouts for debugging, performance analysis and documentation, helping to understand how data is partitioned across workers.
